entries.title: IoT Developer at LiftAuth
entries.subtitle: August 2024 - December 2024
entries.content: Designed and implemented a lift simulator to facilitate robot development with LiftAuth's smart lifts, delivering the end product ahead of schedule. Integrated all aspects of the IoT system, from designing PCBs to building web interfaces and MQTT networks.

entries.title: Web App Development Intern at G Element
entries.subtitle: May 2023 - August 2024
entries.content: Constructed a full stack application from scratch to enable building managers to create Standard Operating Procedures. Utilized Vue and Quasar for frontend, and Express and PostgresSQL for backend development.

entries.title: Software Team, Singapore AUV Challenge
entries.subtitle: January 2023 - December 2023
entries.content: Achieved 13th place in the finals as part of NUS Bumblebee's Team Hornet. Specialized in implementing camera vision techniques, including optical flow and YOLO detection models for improved drone velocity and target recognition.

entries.title: Team Lead, 3D Tronics Digital Making National Competition
entries.subtitle: January 2019 - December 2019
entries.content: Developed a high-fidelity prototype for blind accessibility to public transport. Won the 'Most Innovative Design' award among 32 competing schools.

entries.title: Bojio
entries.subtitle: May 2023 - August 2024
entries.content: Developed a web app for NUS students to manage schedules and coordinate meetups. Gained experience with backend development in C# and Springboot, and used Vercel for hosting.

entries.title: Remote Controlled Rescue Bot
entries.subtitle: January 2023 - May 2023
entries.content: Created a remote-controlled bot using Arduino and Raspberry Pi, integrating sensors for visualization and mapping a room with near 100% accuracy. Constructed a UART communication protocol between the Arduino and Pi using bare-metal programming.
